name: Dungeon Of Conquest
description:
This is a fast-paced puzzle-based dungeon crawler developed for my final year project. Bear in mind this is my first game I have developed. If there are any inquiries, please free to contact me through my email. This version is just to test the basic game mechanics that are available in the game. Have Fun!

Available in: Android & WebGL

Controls:
1. Joystick for Android

2. w,a,s,d and arrow keys for WebGL

Please feel free to answer my questionnaire for my research:

https://forms.gle/gMdwFXWLLCGHHB9T9
